name: Neo Nucleus
description:
DOWNLOAD FOR RADIO/MUSIC!

Audio semi-broken for web version, use executable for better audio.

Neo Nucleus is a 2D bullet hell where you join Suspect B22 and her slimey nucleus partner as they rescue the nuclei’s alien kin.

WASD to move

Mouse to aim

Left click to throw the Nucleus (Terry)

Right click to cancel the throw

Esc to pause

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 game jam under the theme "Joined Together"

The web build won't work on some browsers. On Brave you must disable shields.
